verses.text_plain: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?
verses.verse_html:
1Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men? ▼
▼ Al–taschith…: or, Destroy not
 , ▼
▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Al–taschith…: or, Destroy not
▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

verses.text_plain: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.
verses.verse_html: 2Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.

verses.text_plain: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.
verses.verse_html:
3The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies. ▼
▼ as soon…: Heb. from the belly

tokens.text: as soon as they be born

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as soon…: Heb. from the belly
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as soon…: Heb. from the belly

verses.text_plain: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;
verses.verse_html:
4Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear; ▼
▼ like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc
 , ▼
▼ adder: or, asp

footnotes.body_text: ▼ like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ like the poison: Heb. according to the likeness, etc

verses.text_plain: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.
verses.verse_html:
5Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely. ▼
▼ charming…: or, be the charmer never so cunning

footnotes.body_text: ▼ charming…: or, be the charmer never so cunning
footnotes.body_html: ▼ charming…: or, be the charmer never so cunning

verses.text_plain: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O Lord.
verses.verse_html: 6Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O Lord.

verses.text_plain: Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.
verses.verse_html: 7Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.

tokens.text: let them be as cut in pieces

verses.text_plain: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.
verses.verse_html: 8As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.

verses.text_plain: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath.
verses.verse_html:
9Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath. ▼
▼ both…: Heb. as living as wrath

tokens.text: he shall take them away as with a whirlwind

footnotes.body_text: ▼ both…: Heb. as living as wrath
footnotes.body_html: ▼ both…: Heb. as living as wrath

verses.text_plain: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 10The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.
verses.verse_html:
11So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth. ▼
▼ a reward…: Heb. fruit of the, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a reward…: Heb. fruit of the, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a reward…: Heb. fruit of the, etc
